meanings.definition: A game played by kicking a ball
meanings.sent1: During recess, we always play kickball in the schoolyard.
meanings.sent2: The children had a blast playing kickball at the park.
meanings.sent3: The kickball game got so intense that even the teachers joined in.
meanings.sent4: In the world of playground sports, kickball reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the kickball being kicked echoed across the field.

meanings.definition: The ball used in the game of kickball
meanings.sent1: Tommy accidentally kicked the kickball into the neighbor's yard.
meanings.sent2: The kickball rolled down the hill and into the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog ran off with the kickball, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The bright red kickball stood out against the green grass.
meanings.sent5: Every kickball has its own unique scuff marks from countless games.
